# writeMask

**Instance Property**

A bitmask that determines to which bits that stencil operations can write.

## Declaration

```swift
var writeMask: UInt32 { get set }
```

## Discussion

[doc://com.apple.metal/documentation/Metal/MTLStencilDescriptor/writeMask] are used for logical AND operations to values that are going to be written into a stencil attachment as the result of a stencil operation.

The least significant bits of the write mask are used. The default value is all ones. A logical AND operation with the default [doc://com.apple.metal/documentation/Metal/MTLStencilDescriptor/writeMask] does not change the value.

## Configuring stencil bit mask properties

- **readMask**: A bitmask that determines from which bits that stencil comparison tests can read.
